BlackNightmare:

"Are you shure that you like share this pet with me, 
Hellplague????"said the femme"I thought that you hated me"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "If I can't scan him externally, then I'll access his data 
network.  That way I can actvate him and brainwash him while he is 
offline."
> The probe was replaced with a multi interface data link.  It moved 
down into the gel and opened his chest panel.  The t- rex head on 
his chest lifted and opened, revealing the curcuitry inside.  The 
interface connected and Hellplague went to the computer again.  She 
began accessing his core memory, as well as his software.  
> "OOOOh, someone has put heavy restrictions on him.  He is actually 
more powerful than what we saw!"
> She set the computer to work, trying to unlock the restrictions on 
his power absorbtion, his EPS grid, and his anti grav core.
> "It will take a few minutes, but once the computer is done, we can 
begin the brainwashing proceedure."
> he swep commander walked over to the table and stuck one hand into 
the gel.  She carressed the seemingly soft face of the bounty 
hunter, and grinned more.
> "I always wanted an obediant pet.  If you want, we may share him, 
just us two?" Hellplague said with her grin plastered on her face.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> "Have you found something?"aske coriuosity the femme
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > Hellplague watched the sensor probe a while longer, before 
walking 
> over to the wall monitor.  the monitor showed nothing at the 
moment, 
> because the computer was compiling the data on Malice's arm.  A 
few 
> moments later, the screen came on again and this time with 
> information.
> > At first on might mistake the image as a mistake, for the image 
> appeared to be from an organic creature.  Muscle tissues, 
> circulatory systems, it appeared to be a glitch or the wrong 
> information.  But upon closer inspection, Hellplague found curcuit 
> pathways, fiber optic wiring, and armies of nano robots.  The 
image 
> zoomed out to examine the bounty hunter's skin, and the secret of 
> his ability to absorb energy.
> >  
> > Or so Hellplague thought.
> >  
> > Other than his skin being a mass of synthetic substances 
organized 
> to be organic, nothing amazing, no revelation, just his skin.
> >  
> > "Who did this?  Able to disguise their work so well?  Oh well.  
> Time to examine his power system.  Time to wake him up-"
> > Hellplague stopped as she realized something.  Thn she 
devilishly 
> grinned and began to chuckle.  She walked back over to the table 
and 
> began tapping commands into the controls.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > The femme din't say anything else, and watched.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > The Sweep commander backhanded the other femme with a vicious 
> > snarl.
> > > "It would be well under way if the damned bot was online!  And 
> > since you aren't forth coming with details, I'll have to fully 
> > examine him before I can try to re activate him."
> > > Hellplague returns to the console on the table.  The arm over 
> the 
> > table drops down and extends a probe into the gel and begins 
> making 
> > passes over Malice's upper arm.  The screen on the wall begins 
to 
> > register, and Hellplague walks over to it.
> > > "Amazing... such technology... such craftmanship... I have 
never 
> > seen anything like this before.  He is unlike anything else in 
the 
> > universe.  That's why he was so powerful!  His healing, ability 
to 
> > absorb energy, he is one of a kind."
> > > She turns and walks back to the table, placing a finger on her 
> > chin thoughtfully.  She then turns to Blacknightmare.
> > > "As soon as I finish scanning him I will proceed with 
> brainwashing 
> > him."
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare::
> > > 
> > > "Hiow long will you take to brainwashed him????"snarled 
> > > BlackNightmare"Unicron's pacience has limits"
